36#include "krb5_locl.h"
37
38KRB5_LIB_FUNCTION int KRB5_LIB_CALL
39krb5_getportbyname (krb5_context context,
40 const char *service,
41 const char *proto,
42 int default_port)
43{
44 struct servent *sp;
45
46 if ((sp = roken_getservbyname (service, proto)) == NULL) {
47#if 0
48 krb5_warnx(context, "%s/%s unknown service, using default port %d",
49 service, proto, default_port);
50#endif
51 return htons(default_port);
52 } else
53 return sp->s_port;
54}
55
